title: The President of the Republic receives credentials of the new ambassadors of Angola, Japan and Tunisia in Algeria
text: The President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, received on Sunday the credentials of three (3) new Ambassadors in Algeria:

His Excellency the Ambassador of the Republic of Angola, Mr Toko Diakenga Serao, His Excellency the Ambassador of Japan, Mr Akira Kono, and His Excellency the Ambassador of the Republic of Tunisia, Mr Ramdhane Elfayedh.The ceremony took place at the seat of the Presidency of the Republic, in the presence of the Private Principle Secretary at the Presidency of the Republic, Mr Noureddine Bardad-Daidj, and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum.
